description: Adds one or more rules to the specified IP access control group. This action gives users permission to access their WorkSpaces from the CIDR address ranges specified in the rules.

parameters.name: UserRules
parameters.description: The rules to add to the group. (dict) --- Describes a rule for an IP access control group. ipRule (string) --- The IP address range, in CIDR notation. ruleDesc (string) --- The description.

nested_params.name: ipRule
nested_params.description: The IP address range, in CIDR notation.
